data.title: Always up-to-date list of Instagram ad sizes & specs
data.meta_description: Follow the correct Instagram ad sizes to ensure your specs and aspect ratios are correct on formats like carousel ads, stories and video.
data.text:
Last updated: February 23, 2024

Creating the perfect Instagram ad can be daunting to the majority of us. Updates, new feature releases and much more make this task intimidating, but having a quick reference to ad sizes makes it much easier.

Some of us have our in-house documents floating around with the appropriate Instagram ad sizes–but who updates it and keeps track of the changes? That’s where we come in. Let us give you a bookmarkable blog post that includes everything for your Instagram ad creation needs.

Here’s the complete list of Instagram ad dimensions:

Instagram Feed ads

Instagram Explore ads

Instagram Stories ads

Instagram Carousel ads

Instagram Reels ads

Instagram Feed ads

Instagram is an advertising goldmine because of the unique opportunities to engage with users – there’s nothing quite like taking up the majority of a device’s real estate with a single ad. Think about it: Instagram is really the only “one at a time” scrolling social media platform, so ads get users’ full attention.

Easier said than done–right? Well let us help you by getting the correct image sizes for all the key types of Instagram ads.

Instagram image ads can contain images in various aspect ratios, but the platform recommends a square aspect ratio, which other dimensions may be cropped to fit.

Instagram Feed image ads

Instagram Feed image ad dimensions and guidelines

Minimum resolution: 1080×1080 pixels

Recommended ratio: 1:1

Minimum width: 500 pixels

Minimum aspect ratio: 400×500

Maximum aspect ratio: 191×100

Maximum file size: 30MB

Recommended image formats: JPG, PNG

Instagram Feed image ads character limits

Primary text: 125 characters

Headline: 40 characters

Maximum number of hashtags: 30

Visualize your Instagram ad performance with Sprout

Once you’ve got your ad specs perfected and published, it’s essential to check up on performance.

With Sprout’s Paid Performance Report for Instagram, track any number of campaigns for the metrics that matter most.

Sign up for a free trial today and let Sprout take care of the rest.

Instagram feed video ads

As with many other platforms, the popularity of video is surging on Instagram. But to make sure you’re on top of your video strategy, you must ensure you’re using the correct sizes and specs.

Similar to in-feed image ads, video ads can appear at different aspect ratios, but brands should be mindful of the platform’s own recommendations when planning content to ensure the best appearance across all devices customers may be using.

Instagram Feed video ad specs

Minimum resolution: 1080×1080 pixels

Recommended ratio: 4:5.

Minimum width: 500 pixels

Maximum file size: 4GB

Video length: 1 second to 60 minutes

Recommended video formats: MP4, MOV, GIF

Video captions are recommended.

Video sound is recommended.

Instagram Feed video ads character limits

Primary text: 125 characters

Maximum number of hashtags: 30

Instagram Explore ads

Instagram Explore ads offer businesses a unique avenue to connect with users who are actively seeking new content and inspiration. These ads seamlessly blend into the Explore feed, appearing alongside organic content based on users’ interests and behavior. By leveraging the power of Instagram’s data-driven targeting, advertisers can deliver relevant content to users who are most likely to be interested in their products or services.

Instagram Explore image ads

Ads that appear within Instagram’s Explore discovery feature have slightly different dimensions than standard in-feed ads:

Instagram Explore image ad dimensions and guidelines

Minimum resolution: 1080×1080 pixels

Recommended ratio: 9:16

Minimum width: 500 pixels

Maximum file size: 30MB

Recommended image formats: JPG, PNG

Instagram Explore image ads character limits

Primary text: 125 characters

Instagram Explore video ads

Video ads within Explore have few specific limitations, but display similarly to feed posts.

Instagram Explore video ad specs

Minimum resolution: 1080×1080 pixels

Recommended ratio: 4:5

Minimum width: 500 pixels

Maximum file size: 4GB

Video length: 1 second to 60 minutes

Recommended video formats: MP4, MOV, GIF

Video captions are recommended.

Video sound is recommended.

Instagram Explore video ads character limits

Primary text: 125 characters

Instagram Stories ad sizes

You didn’t think we would forget Instagram Stories here would you?

There’s real power to using Instagram Stories in your social media advertising strategy. Make sure you have the right Instagram Story ad sizes below:

Instagram Stories image ads

Instagram Stories have a lot of features that make single image ads ideal for your marketing campaign. With GIFs, stickers and marker tools, you can easily direct users to clicking or swiping to find more information.

Instagram Stories ad image dimensions and guidelines

Minimum resolution: 1080×1080 pixels

Recommended ratio: 9:16

Minimum width: 500 pixels

Maximum file size: 30MB

Recommended image formats: JPG, PNG

Instagram Stories image ads character limits

Primary text: 125 characters

Instagram Stories video ads

According to Social Media Week, roughly 70% of Instagram Stories videos are watched with sound. It’s really important to make sure your videos drive the right message, all within the correct specs.

Instagram Stories video ad specs

Minimum resolution: 1080×1080 pixels

Recommended ratio: 9:16

Minimum width: 500 pixels

Maximum file size: 4GB

Video length: 1 second to 60 minutes

Recommended video formats: MP4, MOV, GIF

Video captions are recommended.

Video sound is recommended.

Instagram Stories video ads character limits

Primary text: 125 characters

Instagram Carousel ad sizes

If a carousel option for Instagram advertising sounds familiar, that’s because Facebook has carousel ads, too.

This type of ad format allows brands to showcase multiple images or videos in one single ad. It’s truly the best bang for your Instagram ad buck. See the full specs details below:

Instagram Feed Carousel ads (images and videos)

If you’re like anyone else on Instagram, you flip through content at blinding speeds. Why not try to keep users around for a while with more than one piece of visual content?

Carousel ad image dimensions and guidelines

Minimum resolution: 1080×1080 pixels

Recommended ratio: 1:1

Maximum file size (images): 30MB

Maximum file size (videos): 4GB

Recommended image formats: JPG, PNG

Recommended video formats: MP4, MOV, GIF

Video length: 1 second to 2 minutes

Number of Carousel cards: 2 to 10

Instagram Carousel ads character limits

Primary text: 125 characters

Maximum number of hashtags: 30

Landing page URL required

Instagram Reels ad sizes

Instagram Reels revolutionized how we consume content, offering captivating short-form videos that entertain and inform. Advertising through Instagram Reels allows brands to connect with users authentically, leveraging the platform’s wide reach and immersive experience to share meaningful stories and messages. Whether it’s behind-the-scenes glimpses, tutorials or product showcases, Reels offers endless possibilities for brands to share their narrative and connect with their target audience on a more personal level.

Instagram Reels image ads

Instagram Reels can be a collection of both images or videos and the inclusion of music or sound. Test different combinations of Reels formats for your audience to find the most engaging combination.

Instagram Reels image ad dimensions and guidelines

Minimum resolution: 1080×1080 pixels

Recommended ratio: 9:16

Minimum width: 500 pixels

Maximum file size: 30MB

Recommended image formats: JPG, PNG

Instagram Reels image ads character limits

Primary text: 72 characters

Instagram Reels video ads

For video-specific Reels, or image and video compilation Reels, review the specs below.

Instagram Reels video specs

Minimum resolution: 500×888 pixels

Recommended ratio: 9:16

Maximum file size: 4GB

Video length: 1 second to 15 minutes

Recommended video formats: MP4, MOV

Video captions are recommended.

Video sound is recommended.

Instagram Reels ads should not contain:

Licensed music

Media that contains a face or camera effect

Media with a GIF

Media with product tags

View more Reels video ads guidelines on Meta for Business

Instagram Reels video ads character limits

Primary text: 72 characters

To find more information, check out the Facebook Help Center and Instagram Business Help Center. Want to know more visual specs?
